Class SceneManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.SceneManager
public class SceneManager extends Object
Manages scene navigation and stage transitions for the application. Handles loading FXML files and switching between scenes.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • SceneManager

      public SceneManager()

  • Method Details

    • loadFXML

      public static javafx.scene.Parent loadFXML(String fxmlFileName, Class<?> loaderClass)
      Loads an FXML file and returns the root Parent node.
      Parameters:
      fxmlFileName - The name of the FXML file (e.g., "mainMenu.fxml")
      loaderClass - The class to use for resource loading (typically the controller class)
      Returns:
      The loaded Parent node, or null if loading fails

    • getStage

      public static javafx.stage.Stage getStage(javafx.scene.Node node)
      Gets the Stage from a given Node by traversing up the scene graph.
      Parameters:
      node - Any node in the scene
      Returns:
      The Stage containing the node, or null if not found

    • switchToScene

      public static boolean switchToScene(javafx.stage.Stage stage, String fxmlFileName, Class<?> loaderClass, int width, int height)
      Switches the scene on the given stage to the specified FXML file.
      Parameters:
      stage - The stage to switch scenes on
      fxmlFileName - The name of the FXML file to load
      loaderClass - The class to use for resource loading
      width - The width of the new scene
      height - The height of the new scene
      Returns:
      true if the scene was successfully switched, false otherwise

    • switchToSceneFromNode

      public static boolean switchToSceneFromNode(javafx.scene.Node node, String fxmlFileName, Class<?> loaderClass, int width, int height)
      Switches the scene on the stage containing the given node to the specified FXML file. Convenience method that gets the stage from the node automatically.
      Parameters:
      node - Any node in the current scene
      fxmlFileName - The name of the FXML file to load
      loaderClass - The class to use for resource loading
      width - The width of the new scene
      height - The height of the new scene
      Returns:
      true if the scene was successfully switched, false otherwise

    • switchToMainMenu

      public static boolean switchToMainMenu(javafx.scene.Node node, Class<?> loaderClass)
      Switches to the main menu scene from the given node.
      Parameters:
      node - Any node in the current scene
      loaderClass - The class to use for resource loading
      Returns:
      true if the scene was successfully switched, false otherwise

    • handleTransitionError

      public static void handleTransitionError()
      Handles scene transition errors by exiting the application. Should be called when a critical scene transition fails.
